jcr:root.jcr:description: needs two bindings: `app` and `pageType`. Finds pages in /content/{app} and /content/experience-fragments/{app} that don't have a jcr:content child, and fix them with empty jcr:content child, with only `sling:resourceType` property, set to XF generic type or for the pages in the content tree, `pageType` that must be added in the bindings
